body: Is she bringing her son along to some of her gangbangs to use as an alibi or excuse? there are a couple of panels that indicate that the son has interacted with the guys that are pounding his mom. I guess we have to wait until the translation to be sure.
Bro part 3 out when part 2 ain’t even get English translation bruhhhh
bruh what is this? Naruto? so much flashback, my dick can't focus.
@Zombieadd what I understood is that this woman was a slut even before her marriage. There're some flashback from her schooldays when she had gangbang with these guys.
Translator team i beg u please translate this series 🙏

At this point, this needs to be TL'd to properly understand the story, the panels are like jumping all over the place. I'm sure we can figure out a lot of things but the small details for it, if you are following this NTR story so far, are left in a cloud. I like the art, I think it's nice but we need TL and if that's the ending for this part, it feels that there is more like a part 3 or 4, just my speculation.
